channel.title: ByteDance on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in ByteDance on FinanClub

item.title: SNAP
item.description: score:26 Chances: The House of Representatives approved a bill that could potentially force ByteDance to sell or divest from TikTok within 6 months, providing an opportunity for US-based companies to acquire the app. There is bipartisan support for the legislation, indicating a strong chance of it progressing through Congress.
